name: fabricate
description: A system-agnostic, flexible crafting module for FoundryVT

scripts.releaseLocal: npm run test && npm run buildDev && node scripts/releaseLocal.js
scripts.build: webpack build --mode=production --devtool=source-map && npm run compileLess && npm run buildDist
scripts.buildDev: webpack build --mode=development --devtool=eval-source-map && npm run compileLess && npm run buildDist
scripts.buildDist: mkdir -p dist && npm run copyLanguages & npm run copyCompendia & npm run copyReadme & npm run copyManifest &  npm run copyTemplates &  npm run copyAssets
scripts.copyTemplates: mkdir -p dist/templates/partials && cp -r src/templates/*.hbs dist/templates/ && cp -r src/templates/partials/*.hbs dist/templates/partials/

author: Matthew Potts
